Name: BLOCkCORsair
About the game: BLOCkCORsair is a 2D shooter game where you play as an air pirate in a world where airships come and go, engage in battles, loot, strengthen your own airship, and loot some more. Defeat the most dangerous enemies and become the king of air pirates! Customize Build your own airship by freely assembling dropped parts from enemy ships you have destroyed. Customization is up to you. Create your own original airship and enter a new battlefield. battle Launch out with a customized airship. When you can't beat the enemy, customize your airship and launch it again. Build a stronger ship and head into battle against challenging enemies.
